meanings.definition: The quality of being resolute or determined.
meanings.sent1: Her resolutenesses in achieving her goals inspired everyone around her.
meanings.sent2: His resolutenesses in sticking to his principles never wavered.
meanings.sent3: The resolutenesses with which the squirrel chased the nut was both impressive and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The resolutenesses of the mountain stood tall against the changing weather.
meanings.sent5: The resolutenesses of the marathon runner crossing the finish line left a lasting impression.

meanings.definition: The state of being firm in purpose or belief.
meanings.sent1: The resolutenesses of her decision to pursue her passion was unwavering.
meanings.sent2: In times of uncertainty, his resolutenesses provided a sense of stability.
meanings.sent3: The resolutenesses of the cat in ignoring its owner's calls was both amusing and frustrating.
meanings.sent4: The resolutenesses of the old tree roots symbolized strength and endurance.
meanings.sent5: The resolutenesses of the waves crashing against the shore painted a picture of determination.
